column4: Anyone here familiar with ssh-add? I created an ssh key and dragged it to another server and I can ssh from the first server and it asks for the passphrase. I type it in and it connects. But I just want to connect to the second server without the passphrase. When I do ssh-add authorized_keys2 it asks for the passphrase then says it's bad. How is that possible? It's allowing me to ssh with it.
when you created a key, you still have it wrapped with a password
yeah. So do I have to remove the password?
